templates.name: Shopify to Data Studio
templates.description: Aggregate all your Shopify data and change it into actionable insights for inventory optimization, product category performance, measurement of sales campaign effectiveness, etc.

templates.name: Advertising Platforms to Google Sheets
templates.description: Aggregate your advertising data to optimize the monetization of your online traffic and significantly increase revenue.

templates.name: Google Analytics for ThoughtSpot
templates.description: In a few clicks, set up a flow to process and supply Google Analytics data to ThoughtSpot in a format compatible with both the ThoughtSpot SpotApp and the TML block.

templates.name: HubSpot Analytics for ThoughtSpot
templates.description: In a few clicks, set up a flow to supply HubSpot data to ThoughtSpot in a format compatible with the HubSpot Marketing Analytics TML block.

templates.name: Shopify Analytics for Thoughtspot
templates.description: Combine data from Shopify and any of the included ad platforms to get complete view of your e-commerce business with ready-to-go analytics in Thoughtspot.

templates.name: Shopify to BigQuery
templates.description: Aggregate all your Shopify data and change it into actionable insights for inventory optimization, product category performance, measurement of sales campaign effectiveness, etc.

templates.name: Shopify to Snowflake
templates.description: Aggregate all your Shopify data and change it into actionable insights for inventory optimization, product category performance, measurement of sales campaign effectiveness, etc.

templates.name: Shopify to Google Sheets
templates.description: Aggregate all your Shopify data and change it into actionable insights for inventory optimization, product category performance, measurement of sales campaign effectiveness, etc.

templates.name: Shopify to Keboola DWH
templates.description: Don't you have your own data warehouse? Use Keboola provided Snowflake database. Aggregate all your Shopify data and change it into actionable insights.
